lemma min_set_finite: fixes seq :: "nat \<Rightarrow> ('t \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>0 'b::field)" assumes "dickson_grading d" and "range seq \<subseteq> dgrad_sig_set d" and "0 \<notin> rep_list ` range seq" and "\<And>i j. i < j \<Longrightarrow> lt (seq i) \<prec>\<^sub>t lt (seq j)" shows "finite {i. \<not> (\<exists>j<i. lt (seq j) adds\<^sub>t lt (seq i) \<and> punit.lt (rep_list (seq j)) adds punit.lt (rep_list (seq i)))}"
